alert.note: Alert for Northern Coos; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 3:27AM EST until November 17 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Maine, Central Somerset, Northern Franklin, and Northern Oxford Counties. In New Hampshire, Northern Coos and Southern Coos Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to low visibility and snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
